name: Stellarjob
tagline: Bot for giving public shoutouts to people for doing good things
body: ### Stellarjob You're probably seeing this page because someone `+++`'d you via the Stellarjob bot. This means that the sender thinks you did something great, and wants to tell the world about it. To accept your `+++`, you need to do the following: 1. Create a Stellar account at https://launch.stellar.org, if you haven't already. 2. Trust the Stellarjob bot to issue you [amount] `+++`. You can do this by entering your username and password in the box below (the credentials are never sent outside of your browser), or by making a `curl` request as shown below. ``` $ curl -X POST https://test.stellar.org:9002 -d ' { "method": "submit", "params": [ { "secret": "", "tx_json": { "Account": "", "LimitAmount": { "currency": "USD", "issuer": "", "value": 30 }, "TransactionType": "TrustSet" } } ] } ' ```
